analysis.statement: Evaluate the risk and potential impact of any change

checks.description: Verify change impact assessment in Azure DevOps
checks.request: az boards work-item show --id 5678 --organization https://dev.azure.com/fedramp --project fedramp-project --query '{Title:fields."System.Title", RiskAssessment:fields."Custom.RiskAssessment", ImpactAnalysis:fields."Custom.ImpactAnalysis"}' --output json

response.Title: Update security baseline configuration
response.RiskAssessment: Low - Configuration change follows established baseline
response.ImpactAnalysis: Medium - Affects all virtual machines in production environment

checks.description: Verify staging environment testing before production deployment
checks.request: az deployment group list --resource-group fedramp-staging-rg --query '[0:2].{Name:name, ProvisioningState:properties.provisioningState, Timestamp:properties.timestamp}' --output json

checks.description: Verify rollback plans are documented for changes
checks.request: az pipelines release show --id 456 --organization https://dev.azure.com/fedramp --project fedramp-project --query '{ReleaseDefinition:releaseDefinition.name, RollbackTrigger:environments[?name==`Production`].deployPhases[0].deploymentInput.condition}' --output json

checks.description: Verify risk assessment criteria and approval thresholds
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify risk assessment criteria, approval thresholds for different risk levels, and change advisory board procedures
